cast.name: 赫伯特·冯·卡拉扬 Herbert von Karajan
安娜·奈瑞贝科 Anna Netrebko
伦纳德·伯恩斯坦 Leonard Bernstein

皮埃尔·布莱兹 Pierre Boulez

this_title: Music In The Air - A History Of Classical Music On Television
introduction: Music on television has come in various guises over the last 50 years. It was already part of the programme mix at the very beginning and is still around, more sophisticated than ever, live and event driven and at it’s best reaching millions—at any rate more people than those experiencing music in opera houses, concert halls or other venues. Television has been instrumental in popularizing music, preserving precious moments of music making and helping to create music and performances which would not exist without it.
chinese_title: Music In The Air - A History Of Classical Music On Television
